
==Enclosure==

Included with the release is a single sheet folded in half, yielding a four-page enclosure.  The front duplicates the cover of the CD and the back contains a black-and-white photograph of a ticket stub for the event.  The two pages inside contain a wide black-and-white photograph of the band and list the contents of and credits for the release<ref>Enclosure included with Dick's Picks Volume 6, &copy; 1996.</ref>
